text: Melvin A. Steinberg (born October 4, 1933) is an American politician and lawyer. He was the fifth Lieutenant Governor of Maryland from 1987 to 1995 under Governor William Donald Schaefer. He was also President of the Maryland State Senate from January 1983 to 1987, and a member of the State Senate from 1967 until his election as Lieutenant Governor. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Lieutenant Governors of Maryland Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Maryland Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
